docs.snippet: Japan's Toshiba Corp is preparing a potential $2 billion divestment of smart metre group Landis+Gyr, hoping to rake in capital after a major writedown on its U.S. nuclear unit last month, three people familiar with the matter said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's Toshiba Corp is preparing a potential $2 billion divestment of smart metre group Landis+Gyr, hoping to rake in capital after a major writedown on its U.S. nuclear unit last month, three people familiar with the matter said.

headline.main: Exclusive-Japan's Toshiba Prepares $2 Billion Sale of Landis+Gyr-Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Japan's Toshiba Prepares $2 Billion Sale of Landis+Gyr-Sources

docs.snippet: The widow of the gunman who killed 49 people at a gay nightclub in Florida must remain in jail after prosecutors argued that she was a threat to the community and a flight risk, a U.S. judge on Thursday ordered....
docs.lead_paragraph: The widow of the gunman who killed 49 people at a gay nightclub in Florida must remain in jail after prosecutors argued that she was a threat to the community and a flight risk, a U.S. judge on Thursday ordered.

headline.main: U.S. Judge Orders Florida Nightclub Shooter's Widow to Remain in Jail
headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Orders Florida Nightclub Shooter's Widow to Remain in Jail
